A list of the recaps

Written mostly for my (Tom. Hi.) notes, but also in case players miss a session.

Also starring guest writer Jacob.

Session 11

In which the players rescued Blue, but lost Tak

Stardate (at end): 1302.07.03

Starring: Blue, Nuel and Nova

Session 10

In which the players rescued Blue, but lost Tak

Stardate (at end): 1302.06.09

Starring: Blue, Shadow, Diamond, Tak and Nova

Session 9

In which most of the party manage to survive

Stardate (at end): 1302.06.07

Starring: Shadow, Diamond (played by Max), Tak, Iktoc (briefly) and Nova (barely)

Session 8

Infiltration, Insurrection, and Incompetence

Stardate (at end): 1302.06.07

Starring: Shadow, Diamond, Tak, and Iktoc (played mostly by Brandon)

Session 7

In which the crew starts trying to break Blue out of gulag

Stardate (at end): 1302.06.07

Starring: Shadow, Diamond, Tak, Nova and Iktoc

Session 6

In which Blue gets gulagged and everyone else is like "eh we should probably go get him"

Stardate (at end): 1302.06.03

Starring: Blue, Diamond, Shadow and Iktoc

Session 5

In which the players continue to explore Icarus and get into some trouble

Stardate (at end): 1302.06.02

Starring: Blue, Diamond and Ystra

Session 4

In which the players talk to an AI and begin to explore Icarus

Stardate (at end): 1302.06.02

Starring: Blue, Diamond, Nova and Tak

Session 3

In which the players get betrayed, twice

Stardate (at end): 1302.06.01

Starring: Blue, Diamond, Nova and Tak

Session 2

In which the players do some space trucking, some gambling and some kill some L o n g b o y e s

Stardate (at end): 1302.05.01

Starring: Blue, Ystra, Diamond and Tak

Session 1

In which the players literally just walk around a spaceport

Stardate (at end): 1302.04.05

Starring: Blue, Robert Tu, Diamond and Tak
